Class CustomerForm

java.lang.Object
lanej.schedulingsystem.controller.CustomerForm
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerForm extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for managing and interacting with the customer form.

Author:
Jonathan Lane

  • Method Details

    • submitButtonPressed

      public void submitButtonPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the action when the submit button is pressed. Validates input fields, updates an existing customer or inserts a new one.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action event triggered by pressing the submit button.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the controller, populating fields if modifying an existing customer or sets default values for a new customer form.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The URL used to initialize the controller.
      resourceBundle - The ResourceBundle used to initialize the controller.

    • populateDivisions

      public void populateDivisions()
      Populates the division ComboBox based on the selected country in the countryBox. This method gets triggered whenever there's an action on the countryBox.

    • cancelButtonPressed

      public void cancelButtonPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the action when the cancel button is pressed. Prompts the user for confirmation and, if confirmed, returns to the main scene and discards any changes made in the form.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action event triggered by pressing the cancel button.
